name: Skiing/Snowboarding
description: Skiing is a means of transport using skis to glide on snow.Variations of purpose include basic transport, a recreational activity, or a competitive winter sport.

name: Mountain Biking
description: Mountain biking is a sport of riding bicycles off-road, often over rough terrain, usually using specially designed mountain bikes

name: Hiking
description: Hiking means walking outdoors on a trail, or off trail, for recreational purposes. It specifically refers to difficult walking through dense forest, undergrowth, or bushes where forward progress requires pushing vegetation aside.

name: Snowshoeing
description: Snowshoeing is an excellent low-impact aerobic exercise. It lets you extend your hiking and running season and lets you enjoy solitude in areas that might be crowded in summer.

name: Ziplining
description: Zip lining is a pure rush of adrenaline. The feeling of weightlessness as you quickly glide across the line is something that few experiences can match.

name: Mountain Climbing
description: Mountaineering is the set of outdoor activities that involves ascending tall mountains. Mountaineering-related activities include traditional outdoor climbing as well as some indoor mountain climbing activities.
